review: I upgraded my Roku 2 with the Fire 2 and couldn't be happier!  I love the voice search and auto play feature.  The download speed is amazing!  I was questioning if I needed to change internet providers when I was using my Roku 2 because there was so much buffering!  Once I got this product I realized the buffering and slow download times had to do with the Roku and not my internet connection!!!  I am so happy I got this and will be purchasing another one to replace my other Roku!!
